mycentraloregon.com/2015/04/governor-bro.snippet: Salem, Ore. -Governor Kate Brown appointed Patricia Ihnat as a public member of the Oregon Real Estate Board. Pat Ihnat is an attorney who serves as Oregon counsel for Fidelity National Title, a national title insurer and escrow settlement provider.
